mapper.select: SELECT SEC.SECTION_CODE , SECTION_NAME , SEAT_CODE , SEAT_NAME , SEAT_IS_USED , (SELECT MEM_ID FROM SEAT_USE WHERE SEAT.SEAT_CODE = SEAT_CODE AND SEAT_IN_DATE IS NOT NULL AND SEAT_OUT_DATE IS NULL) AS MEM_ID , (SELECT SEAT_USE_CODE FROM SEAT_USE WHERE SEAT.SEAT_CODE = SEAT_CODE AND SEAT_IN_DATE IS NOT NULL AND SEAT_OUT_DATE IS NULL) AS SEAT_USE_CODE FROM ROOM_SECTION SEC, SECTION_SEAT SEAT WHERE SEC.SECTION_CODE = SEAT.SECTION_CODE ORDER BY SECTION_NAME, SEAT_NAME
SELECT SEAT_CODE , DECODE(SEAT_IS_USED, 'N', '대기중', 'Y', '사용중') AS SEAT_IS_USED FROM SECTION_SEAT WHERE SEAT_CODE = #{seatCode}
SELECT SEAT_CODE , SEAT_NAME , DECODE(SEAT_IS_USED, 'N', '대기중', 'Y', '사용중') AS SEAT_IS_USED FROM SECTION_SEAT
SELECT COUNT(MEM_ID) FROM SEAT_USE WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId} AND SEAT_OUT_DATE IS NULL
